events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position on our team. We appreciate your interest and will review your qualifications carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles. We will proceed with the next steps accordingly.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the hiring process and keep you updated on upcoming interviews and requirements.
You have successfully completed the initial screening. Your skills and experience match our requirements well, so we are excited to move forward.
Thank you for your prompt response to our initial screening questions. Your enthusiasm and detailed answers are much appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare for coding exercises and system design discussions.
You have completed the technical interview successfully. Your problem-solving approach and coding skills were impressive.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 11 AM. This will focus on cultural fit and benefits discussion.
Your HR interview has concluded. We appreciate your openness and alignment with the company values and policies.
An official offer has been proposed. Please review the details carefully and let us know if you have any questions about the package.
We have received your feedback on the offer, and we are glad to hear you are interested in joining our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will proceed with onboarding preparations.
Your onboarding process has begun. Please complete all required documentation and attend the introductory sessions scheduled for next week.
The hiring process is now complete, and you have successfully joined our engineering team. We look forward to your contributions.
